729614f-a.title: Richmond: Sand Lane - Robin Road
729614f-a.text:
Sand Lane, north from Robin Road (Old Town Road).
AVEuat 25, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729614f-a.folder: Sand Lane & Robin Road, Staten Island, NY

729612f-a.title: Richmond: Sand Lane - Robin Road
729612f-a.text:
(1)
Sand Lane, south from Robin Road (Old Town Road),
showing the South Beach Station of the Staten Island
Railroad.
August 25, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the South Beach railroad station,
and the village of Arrochar, as seen from Seaside
Boulevard, south of Sand -ane.
June 2, 1935
r. L. Sperr
729612f-a.folder: Sand Lane & Robin Road, Staten Island, NY

729613f-a.title: Richmond: Sand Lane - Robin Road
729613f-a.text:
Sand Lane, at the N. W. corner of Robin Road (old Town
Road), showing the old St. Cuthbert-by-the-Sea Roman Catholic
Church. It appears that at the time this photograph was taken
the edifice was no longer being used as a church.
Summer, 1923
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date. The sign (right) indicates
that the building is being used as a pool room.
August 25, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729613f-a.folder: Sand Lane & Robin Road, Staten Island, NY
